brief.brief: Tasks are individual pieces of the Change request, and when put together, comprise the entire change.
The Tasks (Open Task) option is available from a number of different screens within Change Management.
You can attach any number of Tasks to a Change request using the Task option within Change Management.
Service Manager automatically populates some of the fields on the task record when you open a task.

detail.detail: Specify pertinent information and press F2 (Open Task) to add the record.
At this point, you may open another task by pressing F1 (Open Task), update the current task by pressing F2 (Update Task), or close the current task by pressing F4 (Close Task).
To close a Task, you must fill in the completion code and confirm the close option.
